title: Identifying the GCF
text: The expression contains a GCF (greatest common factor) which is $$4x^4$$. Factor out the GCF.

title: Identifying Polynomial Type
text: Since there are two terms in the parantheses, the polynomial type is a binomial.
speech: Since there are two terms in the parantheses, the polynomial type is a binomial.

title: Factor Completely
